segments.text: Only one . But I wanted to make sure I'd get it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I really wanted that Chanel bag , too . But just in case you should bid low .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But there are only two more days until the bidding closes !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bid on a Chanel watch at the last minute , and got it sixty percent off !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ... I'm such a newbie . But at least I'm sure I'll get that tennis racket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't count on it , Babe . eBay is always full of surprises .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well ... guess how low the bidding starts on the tennis racket ?
segments.speaker: S1
